title: nyc, how to find a job besides boring.
content:
I’m in NYC and my internship sort of fell through.

Now I’m in NYC with three weekdays to spare. I sort of need to find something that pays, but can’t seem to find a job.

Any suggestions on where to look for design type things. Craigslist sucks and its kind of late to email people.

 [‹ Print Usage in Business Sectors](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907014241/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45608 "Go to previous forum topic") [New Letterhead Fonts antipiracy font lockdown scheme ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907014241/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30452 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fredcastle
